name: Vividisionary
description:
Modern Psychedelia in an Indianised form. A composite artwork made out of images of the Indian flag, a glass bottle with 3-coloured LED lights and a bunch of pens. 

This is an humble attempt to uphold how infinitely beautiful mundane everyday objects are. How, just like these patterns that can loop forever in dimension and sound, our mundane lives can too change into an infinitely progressive, growing existence. 

A merger of photography, photo-manipulation, transformative colouration and original electronic psy music. | @ayushbanerjee
